quiz.text: Which of the following is not a feature of Paytm Payment Bank?
options: It will be allowed to lend to customers
It accepts deposits upto 1 Lakh per customer in savings/ current account and wallet
It offers the services like Debit card, online banking and mobile banking
It offers the facility of online fund transfer to it's customer at free of cost
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following steps has taken by the RBI to tackle bad loans ?
options: It proposes to include some members to constitute requisite benches
It works on a framework to facilitate consistent decision making in bankruptcy
It reconstitutes an Oversight Committee to operate banking ordinance
It works on a framework to facilitate consistent decision making in insolvency
All of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true about Deflation ?
options: It is an increase of price of goods and services that projects Indian Economy
It happens when goods are fewer and buyers are more
It happens when there is more demand and less supply
It is a continuous decrease in prices of goods and services
None of these

options: Premium Legal Rate
Prime Lending Rate
Prime Legitimate Rate
Premium Lavish Rate
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following is true about FII?

It proposes to invest in Indian Market
It generally purchases in large volumes which has impact on stock markets
It includes Pension Funds, mutual funds etc
All of these

It is an index to measure the 'market's

sentiment'

It is a figure indicating the relative prices of

shares on the exchange

It is the process of banking business identifying and verifying the identity of it's clients
It's main purpose is to stop illegal money laundering

quiz.text: What do you mean by Amount at Risk ?

None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true about bankruptcy ?
options: It is a condition in which a firm is unable to meet its obligations
It is a condition in which a person can not meet his/her liabilities
In bankruptcy, all the assets of a company are surrendered to the court for administrator
It is the state of being completely penny less
None of these
